name: Household air pollution from solid fuels
Occupational exposure to diesel engine exhaust
Occupational exposure to polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons
Occupational particulate matter, gases, and fumes
Low birth weight and short gestation
Diet low in nuts and seeds

Diet low in polyunsaturated fatty acids
Diet high in trans fatty acids

Spinal cord lesion below neck level

Contusion in any part of the body
Superficial injury of any part of the body
Foreign body in GI and urogenital system
Internal hemorrhage in abdomen and pelvis
